in.trident.crdr.controllers

Class AdminController

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.trident.crdr.controllers.AdminController

  • @Controller
public class AdminController
extends java.lang.Object
    The class AdminController contains controller mappings related to the url passed by admin level users.

    The methods here contains mappings related to creation, deletion, listing of users and companies.

    Since:
    17 jan 2022
    Version:
    0.0.9d
    Author:
    Nandhakumar Subramanina
